nodes.documentation:
Fallback function
     * The function without name is the default function that is called whenever anyone sends funds to a contract

Check if goal was reached
     * Checks if the goal or time limit has been reached and ends the campaign
nodes.name: checkGoalReached

nodes.documentation:
Withdraw the funds
     * Checks to see if goal or time limit has been reached, and if so, and the funding goal was reached,
sends the entire amount to the beneficiary. If goal was not reached, each contributor can withdraw
the amount they contributed.
nodes.name: safeWithdrawal

checkGoalReached().notice: Check if goal was reached     * Checks if the goal or time limit has been reached and ends the campaign

safeWithdrawal().notice: Withdraw the funds     * Checks to see if goal or time limit has been reached, and if so, and the funding goal was reached, sends the entire amount to the beneficiary. If goal was not reached, each contributor can withdraw the amount they contributed.
